full_title: Wings at the Speed of Sound by Paul McCartney & Wings
name: Wings at the Speed of Sound
name_with_artist: Wings at the Speed of Sound (artist: Paul McCartney & Wings)

songs.full_title: Let 'em In by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Let ’em In
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
Someone knockin' at the door
Somebody ringin' the bell
Someone's knockin' at the door
Somebody's ringin' the bell
Do me a favor
Open the door, and let 'em in, ooh yeah

[Verse]
Someone's knockin' at the door
Somebody ringin' the bell
Someone's knockin' at the door
Somebody's ringin' the bell
Do me a favor
Open the door, let 'em in, yeah, let 'em in

[Bridge 1]
Sister Suzy, brother John
Martin Luther, Phil and Don
Brother Michael, Auntie Gin
Open the door, let 'em in, oh yeah

[Instrumental Verse]

[Bridge 2]
Sister Suzy, brother John
Martin Luther, Phil and Don
Uncle Ernie, Auntie Gin
Open the door, let 'em in, oh yeah

[Verse]
Someone knockin' at the door
Somebody ringin' the bell
Someone's knockin' at the door
Somebody ringin' the bell
Do me a favor
Open the door, and let 'em in
Ooh yeah, yeah, let 'em in now

[Bridge 3]
Sister Suzy, brother John
Martin Luther, Phil and Don, ooh
Uncle Ernie, Uncle Ian
Open the door, let 'em in, oh yeah, yeah

[Verse]
Someone's knockin' at the door
Somebody ringin' the bell
Someone knockin' at the door
Somebody ringin' the bell
Do me a favor
Open the door, and let 'em in
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah

songs.full_title: The Note You Never Wrote by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: The Note You Never Wrote
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Later on, the story goes
A bottle floated out to sea
After days, when it had found the perfect spot
It opened up

[Chorus]
And I read the note that you never wrote to me

[Verse 2]
After all, I'm sure you know
The Mayor of Baltimore is here
After days now he can finally appear
Now at last he's here

[Chorus]
But he never is gonna get my vote
Cause he never is going to get a quote
From the little note that you never wrote to me

[Instrumental break]

[Verse 3]
Further on, along the line
I was arrested on the shore
Holding papers of governments galore
I was taken in

[Chorus]
But I read the note that you never wrote
Yes, I read the note that you never wrote
Ah, I read the note that you never wrote to me

[Outro]
To me
To me
To me

songs.full_title: She's My Baby by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: She’s My Baby
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
My baby
She comes out at night
She's takin' me by surprise
She's my baby
Like gravy, down to the last drop
I keep mopping her up
Yeah yeah, she's my baby

[Verse 1]
She's a baby in the morning time
When the sleep is in her eyes
And the world is waking up
She hasn't risen
Oh believe me, I ain't lyin'
She's a woman

[Verse 2]
She's a lady in the evening time
When the stars are in the sky
That's the time she changes back into a kitten
Oh believe me, I ain't lyin'

[Chorus]
She's my baby
She comes out at night
She's takin' me by surprise
She's my baby
Like gravy, down to the last drop
I keep mopping her up
Yeah, yeah, yeah, she's my baby

[Verse 3]
She's my baby in the morning time
When the sleep is in her eyes
And the world is waking up
She hasn't risen
Oh believe me, I ain't lyin'
She's a woman

[Verse 4]
She's the lady of the evening tide
When the stars are in the skies
That's the time she changes back into a kitten
Oh believe me, I ain't lyin'

[Chorus]
She's my baby
She comes out at night
She's takin' me by surprise
Yeah she's a lady
Ah like gravy, down to the last drop
I keep moppin' it up
Moppin'it up, yeah
She's my baby

[Outro]
Ooh, like gravy
Down to the last drop
I keep moppin' it up
Moppin' it up, yeah
She's my baby

Ooh, like gravy
Down to the last drop
I keep moppin' it up
Moppin' it up, yeah
She's my baby

Ooh, like gravy
Down to the last drop
I keep moppin' it up
Moppin' it up, yeah
She's my baby

songs.full_title: Beware My Love by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Beware My Love
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Can't say, found out
I can't tell you what it's all about
I don't know, who does?
I'll tell you to
Beware my love, beware my love
Beware my love, beware my love
Beware my love, beware my love

[Verse 1]
Whoa whoa whoa! No no no!
I must be wrong, baby, yeah
But I don't believe that he's the one
But you insist, I must be wrong
I must be wrong!
I have to leave, and when I'm gone
I'll leave my message in my song
(That's right, hey)

[Chorus 1]
Beware my love, well he'll bowl you over
Beware my love, before you're much older
Hey, he'll sweep you up under his carpet
You'd be in luck if you could stop it
Come on now
Beware my love

[Chorus 2]
(Lemme tell her)
Well, he'll wear you out, and in a minute
You'll hear a shout, and then you'll be in it
So, so now beware my love, 'cause he'll take you under
Beware, my love, the sound of his thunder
Yeah!

[Verse 2]
I don't believe that he's the one
But if you insist, I must be wrong
I must be wrong
But I have to leave, and when I'm gone
I'll leave my message in my song
That's where I'm gonna leave it, baby
Come on

[Chorus 3]
Beware, my love, don't you know he'll bowl you over?
Beware, my love before you're much older
He's gonna, yeah, he's gonna wear you out
When in a minute, you'll hear a shout
And then you'll be in it
Baby gonna be there
Ow, beware
Yeah I'll be there
Oh, baby, beware
Beware, beware, my love
Yeah, any minute, oh
I don't know if I can stand it anymore
'Cause I'm just gonna say to you my love
That you better be there

[Outro]
Can't say, I've found out
I'll tell you to
Beware my love
Beware my love
Beware my love
Beware my love
Beware my love
Beware my love

songs.full_title: Wino Junko by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Wino Junko
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Doctor Tom is getting on
All he does is sign his name
I get things my brainbox sings
But I'll go down again
Play with fire, getting higher
Higher than a nine foot flame
My soul is spent and so's the rent
But I'll go down again

[Chorus]
Wino junko can't say no
Wino junko, eyes aglow
Pill freak, spring a leak, you can't say no
Till you go down again

[Verse 2]
This and treat you crazy cat
Flying sideways once again
I'm in a spin it makes me grin
But I'll go down again

[Chorus]
Wino junko can't say no
Wino junko, eyes aglow
Pill freak, spring a leak, you can't say no
Till you go down again
Wino junko can't say no
Wino junko, eyes aglow
Pill freak, spring a leak, you can't say no
Till you go down again

[Bridge]
Till you go down again
Till you go down again
Till you go down

[Guitar Solo]

[Verse 3]
Take what I need until I bleed
People will say I've gone insane
Ain't scared to die, it's such a high
Till I go down again

[Chorus]
Wino Junko can't say no
Wino Junko, eyes aglow
Pill freak, spring a leak, you can't say no
Till you go down again
Wino Junko can't say no
Wino Junko, eyes aglow
Pill freak, spring a leak, you can't say no
Till you go down again

[Outro]
Till you go down again
Till you go down again
Wino Junko

songs.full_title: Silly Love Songs by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Silly Love Songs
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
You'd think that people would've had enough of silly love songs
I look around me, and I see it isn't so
Some people want to fill the world with silly love songs
And what's wrong with that?
I'd like to know, 'cause here I go again

[Chorus]
I love you
I love you
I love you
I love you

[Verse 1]
I can't explain, the feeling's plain to me (I love you)
Now can't you see?
Ah, she gave me more, she gave it all to me (I love you)
Now can't you see?
What's wrong with that?
I need to know, 'cause here I go again

[Chorus]
I love you
I love you

[Bridge]
Love doesn't come in a minute
Sometimes it doesn't come at all
I only know that when I'm in it
It isn't silly, love isn't silly, love isn't silly at all

[Saxophone Riff]

[Chorus 2]
How can I tell you about my loved one?
How can I tell you about my loved one?
How can I tell you about my loved one? (I love you)
How can I tell you about my loved one? (I love you)

[Saxophone Riff]

[Chorus 1 & 2/Verse 2]
I love you
I love you
I love you (I can't explain, the feeling's plain to me, say, can't you see?)
I love you (Ah, he gave me more, he gave it all to me, say, can't you see?)
I love you (I can't explain, the feeling's plain to me
Say, can't you see?)
{How can I tell you about my loved one?}
I love you (Ah, he gave me more, he gave it all to me
Say, can't you see?)
{How can I tell you about my loved one?}
I love you
(I can't explain, the feeling's plain to me
Say, can't you see?)
{How can I tell you about my loved one?}
I love you
(Ah, he gave me more, he gave it all to me
Say, can't you see?)
{How can I tell you about my loved one?}

[Saxophone Riff]

[Outro]
You'd think that people would've had enough of silly love songs
I look around me and I see it isn't so, oh, no
Some people want to fill the world with silly love songs
And what's wrong with that?

songs.full_title: Cook of the House by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Cook of the House
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Ground rice, sugar, vinegar, seco salt, macaroni too
Cook of the house
I'm the cook of the house
No matter where I serve my guests
They seem to like the kitchen best
'Cause I'm the cook of the house
Cook of the house

[Bridge]
The salad's in the bowl
The rice is on the stove
Green beans in the colander
And where the rest is heaven only knows

[Verse 2]
Cinnamon, garlic, salt, pepper, corn-bread, curry powder, coffee too
Cook of the house
I'm the cook of the house
No matter where I serve my guests
They seem to like the kitchen best
'Cause I'm the cook of the house
Cook of the house

[Mostly Instrumental Bridge]
And the rest is heaven only knows

[Verse 3]
Cinnamon, garlic, salt, pepper, corn-bread, curry powder, coffee too
Cook of the house
I'm the cook of the house
No matter where I serve my guests
They seem to like the kitchen best
'Cause I'm the cook of the house
Cook of the house
Cook of the house
I'm the cook of the house

songs.full_title: Time to Hide by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Time to Hide
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
If I have to run, I'm not running out on you
If I have to shake a little sand out of my shoes
I'm runnin' from the law, or they'll put me inside

[Chorus]
Baby, won't you let me have a little time to hide?
Baby, won't you let me have a little time to hide?

[Verse 2]
I've been on the run since the good Lord knows when
And the day I die, I'll still be running then
Runnin' from the days when I would lay me down and cry

[Chorus]
Baby, won't you let me have a little time to hide?
Baby, won't you let me have a little time to hide?

[Bridge]
Will I love you tomorrow?
Yes, I will, my love
Yes I will, my love
Will I beg, steal or borrow?
Yes, I will, my love
Oh yes I will, my love

[Chorus]
To spend a little time happy to be by your side
Baby, won't you let me have a little time to hide

[Harmonica and Guitar Solos]

[Verse 1]
If I have to run, I'm not running out on you
If I have to shake a little sand out of my shoes
I'm runnin' from the law, or they'll put me inside

[Outro]
Baby, won't you let me have a little time to hide?
Baby, won't you let me have a little time to hide?
Baby, won't you let me have a little time
Baby, won't you let me have a little time
Baby, won't you let me have a little time to hide?

songs.full_title: Must Do Something About It by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Must Do Something About It
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I've just seen another sunset on my own
All day long I've been alone
And I must do something about it
Yes I must do something about it

[Verse 2]
Played another losing card game with myself
Lonely joker on a shelf
And I must do something about it
Yes I must do something about it

[Bridge]
No one on the party line
No one seems to need a dime
No one even knows that I'm feeling this way

No one seems to need my vote
No one has to change a note
No one here to hold my coat
Oh, what a day

[Verse 3]
I've just watched another movie on t.v
No one's in the house but me
And I must do something about it
Yes I must do something about it
Oh, oh, something about it

[Verse 4]
I've just dialed another number on my phone
All day long I've been alone
And I must do something about it
Yes, I must do something about it

[Verse 1]
I've just seen another sunset on my own
All day long I've been alone
And I must do something about it
Yes I must do something about it
Must do something about it
Yes, I must do something about it

songs.full_title: San Ferry Anne by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: San Ferry Anne
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You've got a lot
And from what you've got
I'd say you're doing well, dear
Dressed like a dream
And if things are what they seem
You're looking swell, dear

[Verse 2]
Your little man
Brings you trinkets when he can
But he can't stay, dear
That's very well
But inside your shiny shell
You dance all day, dear

[Verse 3]
So go, Begay
Let your feelings leap away
Into the laughter
San ferry Anne
And the world keeps turning happy ever after

songs.full_title: Warm And Beautiful by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Warm And Beautiful
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
A love so warm and beautiful
Stands when time itself is falling
A love so warm and beautiful
Never fades away

[Verse 2]
Love, faith, and hope are beautiful
When your world is touched by sadness
To each his own is wonderful
Love will never die

[Bridge]
Sunlight's morning glory
Tells the story of our love
Moonlight on the water
Brings me inspiration ever after

[Instrumental Verse]

[Bridge]
Sunlight's morning glory
Tells the story of our love
Moonlight on the water
Brings me inspiration ever after

[Verse 1]
A love so warm and beautiful
Stands when time itself is calling
A love so warm and beautiful
Never fades away
Never fades away

songs.full_title: Message to Joe by Paul McCartney & Wings
songs.title: Message to Joe
